name: SmartB2B
short_description:
SmartB2B is a PHP, MySQL, Smarty B2B industry e-commerce website management system, the system of supply and demand model, business model, product model, recruitment model, information model module applies to gain a leading position in the industrycompanies to quickly assume a B2B site, you can run Linux and Windows multi-server environment, easy installation and flexible use.

Rich tag library functions: calling labels based on the W3C standard, completely independent of the program, call convenient, easy to use
Popular MVC framework: SmartB2B is based on has been engaged in the development of the Smarty framework based on the upgrade from running more stable, run faster
Default the corporate templates: more abundant tag, allowing companies to more quickly and easily created from a template
Independent language pack functions: the international trend of making the industry e-commerce must face the world market, SmartB2B language
summary: SmartB2B is a free PHP opensource B2B e-Commerce System
